description: Sent when the sync group changes its selected sync source.

event.Summary: Sync group $v2 changed selected sync source to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupSourceChanged LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupIndex u 9999 LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupName s EXAMPLE LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupSelectedSource s EXAMPLE LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncSourceName s EXAMPLE LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupLastChangeTime s EXAMPLEE LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncSourceQuality u 0

description: An arbitrary index assigned to each if entry.
variables.name: LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupIndex

description: The name of the sync group.
variables.name: LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupName

description: The name for the sync source currently used
variables.name: LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupSelectedSource

description: The name of the sync source.
variables.name: LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncSourceName

description: The time when the sync selected sync source
variables.name: LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncGroupLastChangeTime

description: The quality for the sync source. The received S1-byte
The integer values can be interpreted as follows:
SONET (GR253 CORE) - not applicable for EMXP boards:
The following values are also defined for interal use:
16 NSUPP Quality Level not supported by function.
17 FAIL Sync Source in fail state.
variables.name: LUM-SYNC-MIB::syncSourceQuality
